name: Vehicles and Cars Kids Racing: car racing game for kids simple and fun ! FREE
name_original: Vehicles and Cars Kids Racing: car racing game for kids simple and fun ! FREE
description:
A wonderful car racing game for kids with a stunning collection of vehicles !
Does your kid love vehicle games and want to play with cars, motors, trucks ? This is the app for you!

Vehicles and Cars Kids Racing is an educational and entertaining game.
It is a nice, simple, fun, and colorful game for toddlers and kids! Play with vehicles games !
A lot of different levels and many cool vehicles to drive and keep your kid busy.

Easy to learn and to control:
-select your vehicle: motorbike, sports car, SUV or monster truck !
-choose the game mode: arcade or endless !
-touch on the gas pedal to move your vehicle
-try to reach the maximum speed, pick up the turbo ! Increase the speed of your car !
-collect all diamonds and coins to unlock all the cars !
-make a car ramp jump and dodge vehicles !
-but be careful not to overturn the vehicle or you'll lose the game
-drive up to the finish line!
-drive these cars in the shortest time possible
-when a game level is completed tap the arrow to change to the next level

Available for all screen resolutions and devices ( ipad / ipod / iphone )!
Simple and intuitive, your baby will have lots of fun for hours !

This educational game will help your kid to improve reflexes,
logical and cognitive skills, concentration and fine motor skills.

Features:
- high quality game for toddlers and preschool kids from ages 0 to 12 years old with amazing vehicles !
- Easy to use and control
- fun for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and pre-teens, designed for preschool boys and girls
- Simple for toddlers and babies with increasing difficulty
- Toddlers develop their fine motor skills
- Play with your child or let him play alone
- use it to keep your baby or toddler occupied
- a lot of vehicles in this fun racing games for kids
- Simple: control your vehicle with just one finger
- Fast and exciting car racing game
- randomly generated cars games! this educational game will never get old!

Fun and enjoyable to learn and to play, this is a must have app!
A lot of educational car race game for toddlers and young kids!!
Your child will admire every kind of vehicle and will hear realistic sound effects!

Ideal for children but also fun for adults who want to play with their kids!
Are you ready to drive on the road ? Try to get out of traffic ! Feel the asphalt on the streets !
Cars Racing Game for Kids is a funny game which also helps your toddler improving his abilities with the toy cars.
